# robots.txt for Kontrollitud.ee

# Allow all search engines to crawl public pages
User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /companies/
Allow: /company/

# Disallow admin and authentication pages
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /add

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://kontrollitud.ee/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional - 1 second between requests)
Crawl-delay: 1
